textContent:
---things i like about rei---

I like the fact that we're both INTJs and yet we really do vibe with each other even when we're not supposed to.

I like the fact that you're bubbly and energetic all of the time. Your energy is contagious, Rei!

I like it that you're even more of a bookworm than me and that you share cool anecdotes to me.

I like your face. I like the dimples on your cheek. I like the way the edges of your eyes creases whenever you smile. I like your smile, the same way I like the sun, because they both give brightness to a gloomy day.

I like your voice. I want to hear it everyday.

I like it that when I wake up you always greet me with a sweet good morning message to brighten up my morning.

I like it that you always tell me to save the world whenever I start working even when all I do is press stuff on the keyboard. 

I like it that you make me want to become a better version of myself. I'll try to be perfect, just for you.

I like how caring and sensitive you are. I like how you tell me that you're ready to accept my flaws.

I like how you make me feel like I'm never too much and I'm enough.

I like the fact that I miss you every hour of everyday.

I like the fact that I fear losing you, because it just shows how much I value you.

I like you, Rei, and I'll continue liking you everyday. I'll find all the possible reasons to like you, and then after that, we'll grow together and then I'll keep finding newer reasons to like you.
title: January 16, 2024

I like the fact that we're both INTJs and yet we really do vibe with each other even when we're not supposed to.
